name: Limited-pokemon-demo
description:
limited pokemon game demo. submission for major-jam-2.

Walk in the bushes to battle wild pokemon or press enter to battle.

Controls:

arrow keys to walk.

up and down arrow keys to select actions on menu.

'x' to choose actions on menu and advance text.

See the source code and art credits here:

https://github.com/chipset1/major-jam-2
